structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Effect Of Recording Or Registration Of Copy Of Decree
law.text: The recording or registration of a duly certified copy of such decree, attested by the clerk, assistant clerk, register or assistant register, recorder or deputy recorder, as the case may be, of the court where made, in the registry of deeds of the district where said real estate is situated, shall have the same force and effect as if a duly executed deed, conveyance or release had so been recorded or registered.
